mutants.original_line: return [(msg, lvl) for msg, lvl in self.logs if lvl >= level]
mutants.mutated_line: return [(msg, lvl) for (msg, lvl) in self.logs if lvl > level]

mutants.original_line: return [(msg, lvl) for msg, lvl in self.logs if lvl >= level]
mutants.mutated_line: return [(msg, lvl) for (msg, lvl) in self.logs if lvl < level]

mutants.original_line: return [(msg, lvl) for msg, lvl in self.logs if lvl >= level]
mutants.mutated_line: return [(msg, lvl) for (msg, lvl) in self.logs if lvl == level]

mutants.original_line: return [(msg, lvl) for msg, lvl in self.logs if self.name == name and lvl >= level]
mutants.mutated_line: return [(msg, lvl) for (msg, lvl) in self.logs if self.name == name or lvl >= level]

mutants.original_line: return [(msg, lvl) for msg, lvl in self.logs if self.name == name and lvl >= level]
mutants.mutated_line: return [(msg, lvl) for (msg, lvl) in self.logs if self.name != name and lvl >= level]

mutants.original_line: return [(msg, lvl) for msg, lvl in self.logs if self.name == name and lvl >= level]
mutants.mutated_line: return [(msg, lvl) for (msg, lvl) in self.logs if self.name == name and lvl > level]

mutants.original_line: return [(msg, lvl) for msg, lvl in self.logs if self.name == name and lvl >= level]
mutants.mutated_line: return [(msg, lvl) for (msg, lvl) in self.logs if self.name == name and lvl < level]

mutants.original_line: return [(msg, lvl) for msg, lvl in self.logs if self.name == name and lvl >= level]
mutants.mutated_line: return [(msg, lvl) for (msg, lvl) in self.logs if self.name == name and lvl == level]
